game

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.json.JSONString

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.json.JSONString
    The Map Class is a container for the HashSets of Edges and Nodes that make up the playing field of the game. It also allows for easy access to random nodes and edges.
    Author:
    MPatashnik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge[] getAIntersection()
      Returns a 2x1 array of edges that have lines that intersect If no two edges intersect, returns null.

      Returns a HashSet containing all the Edges in this map.
      int getEdgesSize()
      Returns the number of Edges in this map
      Node getNode(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the Node named name in this map if it exists, null otherwise
      java.util.HashSet<Node> getNodes()
      Returns a HashSet containing all the Nodes in this map.
      int getNodesSize()
      Returns the number of Nodes in this map
      Edge getRandomEdge()
      Returns a random edge in this map
      Node getRandomNode()
      Returns a random node in this map
      Node getTruckHome()
      Returns the TruckHome node that Trucks must return to before the game can be ended.

      Returns true if there is any intersection of the lines drawn by the edges in edges, false otherwise.

        Returns the TruckHome node that Trucks must return to before the game can be ended.

        public java.util.HashSet<Edge> getEdges()
        Returns a HashSet containing all the Edges in this map. Allows addition and removal of Edges to this map

      • getEdgesSize

        public int getEdgesSize()
        Returns the number of Edges in this map

      • isIntersection

        public boolean isIntersection()
        Returns true if there is any intersection of the lines drawn by the edges in edges, false otherwise. Used for GUI intersection detection, not useful outside of the GUI context.

      • getAIntersection

        public Edge[] getAIntersection()
        Returns a 2x1 array of edges that have lines that intersect If no two edges intersect, returns null. Used for GUI intersection detection, not useful outside of the GUI context.
